documents.document: @notjustanyboggs Good luck with the new job!
She doesn’t dissect books and ask dumb questions about why certain characters do the things they do. People do stupid things. #1linewed
@kierstenwhite I love @nina_lacour! Would love to win… #happyforbooks.
Moonlight on the estuary.... https://t.co/THAEeBnOAA
This evening's view.... https://t.co/CbscbA99wo
This morning's view.... https://t.co/pAO4wvmOFA
@Michelle4Laughs Cheese. Lettuce. Eggs. Avocado… pretty much anything!
@JackieLindert Excellent! May it continue that way!
@bradfordlit How disappointing!
Whisk Woman and Spatula Man... Coming soon to a kitchen near you. https://t.co/KELMuQOgmW
@JRV_Perry That's what I'm doing this week too. Then I won't feel guilty the rest of the year when I write instead of clean. Maybe….
My new favorite mug.... https://t.co/JhpH3KXZeA
Celebrating the end of the work year with some French champagne. Mmmmm....
@ConfusedMuse You're one step ahead in that you know you need to be careful.
@ConfusedMuse I totally understand that. It's scary to write outside yourself, but when we live in a world outside, we have to reflect that
Okay. I'm going to finish this book tonight. And that's final! #amwriting Come rescue me if it's 2am and I'm still going...
I'm so tired. Why can't this Friday be the the last day of work before the holidays? #burnout
Okay. Time to get my revision on… One chapter to re-write, and one to tweak a little. #amwriting
@ConfusedMuse @ya_geek phew! wouldn't want to have to sit at the short-girl table.
@ConfusedMuse @ya_geek You both have me beat. I'm only 5"1.
@ConfusedMuse no rush. Already know I need to rewrite the ending....
@ConfusedMuse that's fantastic! I'm getting back to work on that one from Monday.
@ConfusedMuse things must be looking up!
@NewLeafLiterary The Master and Margarita. It's a Russian classic and I love it.
The slurred voice seems to come from near the door to the hallway. A drunken giggle then, “Little boy Blue? Is that you?” #1linewed
And… #NaNo won. Book is nowhere near finished, but I'm 50K closer. 50155 words closer. #amwriting
With one day to go, I have just over 2.5K to write to 'win' #NaNo. Not sure if I'll make it, but I will do my darnedest!
@hannahmosk You can do it! You love it, and that's why you do it. And if they laugh once you're gone, you won't know about it.
I'm a little behind with #NaNo, so let's see if I can catch up tonight.
@YA_Geek sure. I'm not Maori, though...
She's on the run-He's too sexy for words CLOAKED IN CHRISTMAS by @TFWalsh Pre-Order now! @DiiBylo #giveaway #RT https://t.co/g3SGOzFU8x
@ConfusedMuse Counting down the days, huh? Might want to move to wine later in the week.
@ConfusedMuse If it was 7 or even 5 days, I'd be more concerned…
@hannahmosk Ugh. I hate that.
Okay #NaNo book. Let's see if we can get to the kissing bit tonight… #amwriting
@ConfusedMuse On the plus side, the week is only 2 days old….
Sunday afternoon #NaNo time. Let's see if I can crack 3K words before I have to stop. 2k would work too, but I'm aiming for 3K.
@ConfusedMuse yikes! How wrong could it be?
Having a reasonable #NaNo so far. Just hit 29K. It's crap, but crap that can be fixed later (I hope).
And now… It's time to #amwriting. Can I get my boys out of the sticky situation they've gotten themselves into? #NaNo
Go Hannah! “@gabimoskowitz: My cousin @hannahmosk is a badass https://t.co/acOK63RUba”
@bradfordlit that's how I pick who to bet on in horse races. If the jockey's blouse isn't nice colors, no bet.
I'm about ready for these aftershocks to stop.
The extent of our earthquake damage. We're very lucky! https://t.co/jdr6vIfjeu
@ConfusedMuse definitely. Still aftershocks too. Just felt another one now.
@ConfusedMuse yes. One rack of cds fell over. That's it... weird, huh?
@ConfusedMuse that's good. School cancelled and we've been told not to come in to the city to work.
@ConfusedMuse they all seem to be. All your people here safe?
@ConfusedMuse good. Tired after spending the night in the car after being evacuated for tsunami warning.
All ok after big quake. Evacuated in case of tsunami and sitting in car at top of nearest hill!
He wears many hats.... https://t.co/WB69paBdvu
Time to get back to #amwriting on my #NaNo project. I'm behind, but hope to catch back up this evening.
@hannahmosk ah... doesn't have to be fake though... just finish on 65k!
@hannahmosk you're doing better than me… Only 15K in with my biracial abused runaways….
2016, you have been a fuck of a year. Get out of Dodge and quick. I can't wait to see the back of you.
I'm going to write now. I'm certain my fictional world, no matter how horrible, can't be worse than the reality I'm seeing. #amwriting
@MissDahlELama that's the best news! Which I need right now. You will be an amazing mom.
@MissDahlELama did I miss something? Are you preggers? Congratulations!!!
I have a couple of hours… Let's see how much #amwriting I can get done on my #NaNo project.
Okay… Time to write. Let's try for another 3K night, shall we? #NaNo #amwriting
Finishing day 2 of #NaNo with just over 5K. I'll take it! #amwriting
2000 words in and feeling good… #NaNo #amwriting
And so it begins… About to start my NaNo book for 2016. Wish me luck. I have no idea where this might lead. #amwriting
Set myself up with a new book (title and all) for NaNo, so I have to do it now, right?
Anyone want to beta-read a YA novel for me? @ me if you're interested & I can tell you more… #amwriting
Technology is not my friend this evening...
@ConfusedMuse A wee clue maybe???
Rewrote the ending of my book 2 nights ago. Now to read it and decide if I need to go back to how it was before… #amwriting
Look what just showed up at my place! @LXCain https://t.co/t3VOJclMKx
Okay. Let's finish this book tonight, shall we? #amwriting
I want to keep revising, but I'm so tired, I have to go to bed. #amnotwriting
I'm playing WordBrain and I've just reached brain size 1768! #WordBrain #words
@CoreyAnnHaydu Souffle…. It's always an adventure.
Kinda ridiculously excited about seeing Reverend Horton Heat play live tonight!
I'm playing WordBrain and I've just reached brain size 1564! #WordBrain #words
BLOODWALKER released! Want a #Thriller #Mystery #Horror? A brilliant page-turner? Go here https://t.co/CxXomy6ljv https://t.co/xHe89Ef0pa
I'm playing WordBrain and I've just reached brain size 1228! #WordBrain #words
Want to read something awesomely creepy? Bloodwalker is available now! https://t.co/dG75rmM6cX
@hannahmosk Hang in there. I know it's hard sometimes, but know that you're loved and cherished and we'd miss you horribly if you left.
Please help support Banned Books Week 2016, add a #Twibbon now! https://t.co/nhdurbnN0a
Hoping to finish my revisions tonight. Cross your fingers for me, y'all. Going in to those last 2 chapters. #amwriting
Revising is weird. Some chapters are perfect as they are and I might change one word. Others, what the heck was I thinking? #amwriting
@ConfusedMuse I'd be keen! But I am already in NZ, so that makes a difference...
Let's get this revision happening. 9 chapters to go until this book is ready for beta readers. #amwriting
@hannahmosk People are so gross! I wish I could do something for you. This behavior is unforgivable.
@djdannylemon Not romance really… YA adventure. Although there is a speck of romance...
Happy Book Birthday to Auctioning Affection! #Win an Amazon GC from Best Selling Author Allyson Lindt @AllysonLindt https://t.co/waUq9k2893
@ConfusedMuse I feel her pain. I think I need to nap now too… All night, if possible.
want to keep writing, but so tired I think I might drop off on my keyboard… #nightall
@ConfusedMuse The disappointment will be crushing, I'm sure...
@ConfusedMuse You will give her bite, of course….
Why hello new followers! I will do my best to be entertaining. Can't promise anything too wild though. Keep your expectations low.
Listening to classical music while I revise is so soothing. Not sure why I don't always do this… #amwriting
Okay… Enough web-surfing. Time to edit. #amwriting
The sour smell of vomit mingled with the blood-scent like some unholy perfume. #lineofthenight #amwriting
Been way too distracted by life lately. Tonight I get serious about revising. Not going to bed until I get 2 chapters done. #amwriting
#IStandForDiversity because the world is diverse and I want to see the world represented, not just one corner of it.
Whenever I go to gigs these days, the audience seems really old...
should be working on revising my novel, but instead, I'm writing short film scripts. #amwriting
@ConfusedMuse But it has a love heart on it. How can you be scared?
